compat-change.description:
Disables foreground service background starts from BOOT_COMPLETED broadcasts for all types except:
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_LOCATION}
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_CONNECTED_DEVICE}
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_REMOTE_MESSAGING}
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_HEALTH}
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_SYSTEM_EXEMPTED}
  • {@link android.content.pm.ServiceInfo#FOREGROUND_SERVICE_TYPE_SPECIAL_USE}
compat-change.name: FGS_BOOT_COMPLETED_RESTRICTIONS

compat-change.description: Disables foreground service background starts in System Alert Window for all types unless it already has a System Overlay Window.
compat-change.name: FGS_SAW_RESTRICTIONS

compat-change.description: Foreground services of certain types will now have a time limit. If the foreground service of the offending type is not stopped within the allocated time limit, it will receive a callback via {@link Service#onTimeout(int, int)} and it must then be stopped within a few seconds. If an app fails to do so, it will be declared an ANR. @see Service#onTimeout(int, int) onTimeout callback for additional details
compat-change.name: FGS_INTRODUCE_TIME_LIMITS

compat-change.description: The BG-launch FGS restriction feature is going to be allowed only for apps targetSdkVersion is higher than R.
compat-change.name: FGS_BG_START_RESTRICTION_CHANGE_ID

compat-change.description: If a service can not become foreground service due to BG-FGS-launch restriction or other reasons, throws an IllegalStateException.
compat-change.name: FGS_START_EXCEPTION_CHANGE_ID

compat-change.description: If enabled, the FGS type check against the manifest FSG type will be enabled for instant apps too. Before U, this check was only done for non-instant apps.
compat-change.name: FGS_TYPE_CHECK_FOR_INSTANT_APPS
